name: Snowflake Festival
description:
The Snowflake Festival is just around the corner. And YOU have the honor of serving the food. Hooray! Try to achieve the highest possible score and show everyone that you are the best butler.

Controls:
WASD: Move
Spacebar: Jump
LMB: Pick up/Throw
RMB: Drop
Tab: Switch Item
E: Buy Item
I: Toggle Displays
Shift: Was meant for sprinting.,.. But does not work in desktop build... for unknown reasons :-)
U: Unknown????

Credits:
Music: Musenet
